section.heading: Incorporation by Reference.
section.text: Except for the changes shown in Regulation .02 of this chapter, all provisions of 16 CFR 1602, 1605, 1608, 1609, 1610, 1611, 1615, 1616, and 1632, are incorporated by reference.

para.text: In the incorporation by reference cited in Regulation .01 of this chapter, the following terms have the meanings indicated.
"Act" means the Maryland Flammable Products Act, Health-General Article, Title 22, Subtitle 4, Annotated Code of Maryland.
"Commission" means the Maryland Department of Health.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, Title 22, Subtitle 4, Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .01 amended and recodified to Regulations .01 and .02 effective October 23, 1995 (22:21 Md. R. 1616)
